alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 8:34PM MST until January 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of light to occasionally moderate snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches across the lower elevations with 4 to 8 inches on Casper Mountain. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 11 AM Wednesday. The heaviest snow is expected between 3 AM and 10 AM. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Area roads could become slushy to snowpacked by sunrise Wednesday. Roads are then expected to become more wet as the afternoon progresses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall around 5 inches is possible across the northern end of the county, which includes Midwest and Edgerton.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
